thing.field: A recruit? What do you want with this gatehouse?≺Prompt≻
Only citizens of San d'Oria may apply for missions here. Go see your country's consulate in Northern San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
Finish your current mission first, then come back for another.≺Prompt≻

Which mission will you undertake? ≺Selection Dialog≻Smash the Orcish Scouts. Bat Hunt. Save the Children. The Rescue Drill. The Davoi Report. Journey Abroad. Journey to Bastok. Journey to Windurst. Journey to Bastok. Journey to Windurst. Infiltrate Davoi. The Crystal Spring. Appointment to Jeuno. Magicite. The Ruins of Fei'Yin. The Shadow Lord. Leaute's Last Wishes. Ranperre's Final Rest. Prestige of the Papsque. The Secret Weapon. Coming of Age. Lightbringer. Breaking Barriers. The Heir to the Light. 10-1. 10-2. ダミー26. ダミー27. ダミー28. ダミー29. ダミー30. None.≺Prompt≻
Accept this mission? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. No.≺Prompt≻
You accept the mission.≺Prompt≻
What do you want with this gatehouse?≺Prompt≻
Your business? ≺Selection Dialog≻A mission, please. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Hmm...not much work for those wet behind the ears, but...≺Prompt≻
How about slaying Orcish scouts? Only the yellowest of yearlings would run from that, and we've no work for cowards here.≺Prompt≻
If you're to take the mission, I'll be happy to explain.≺Prompt≻
Interested? ≺Selection Dialog≻Tell me more. Never mind.≺Prompt≻
Here's your mission. Orcish scouts roam outside; kill one and bring me his axe as proof.≺Prompt≻

You'll have to bring me ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. No other kind will do. Understand?≺Prompt≻
That is all. You'll take the mission then?≺Prompt≻
Do you accept the mission? ≺Selection Dialog≻I accept. Could you explain again? No, thank you.≺Prompt≻
Bring me one of those axes, and your mission will be a success. No running away now; we've a proud country to defend!≺Prompt≻
Oh, you're back. Well, if you're so happy you defeated an Orc or two, you've a long way ahead of you!≺Prompt≻
That's another ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ for the armory, then. Mission complete! Not bad for a new recruit.≺Prompt≻
What? I don't want this!≺Prompt≻
Are you really a new recruit!?≺Prompt≻
Listen, before you bring me something, you must first accept the mission! That is how things work around here!≺Prompt≻
Persistent, aren't you? An Orc under the belt does not a hero make! Ah, I've just the job for you...≺Prompt≻
Bat patrol! How about it? Shouldn't be a problem for an adventurer such as yourself, no?≺Prompt≻
Here's your mission, then. Clear out bats lurking in King Ranperre's Tomb and bring me a fang as proof.≺Prompt≻

Bring me ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ and your mission will be a success.≺Prompt≻
Deep in the tomb you'll find Goblins. Take care; I don't want to lose you yet.≺Prompt≻
Ah, you've returned! I was afraid that Goblins got you.≺Prompt≻
That's one ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ for the gatehouse, then. Mission complete. Not bad for a new recruit.≺Prompt≻
Ah, the recruit's back again? I'm sorry, but I've no time for you today.≺Prompt≻
Well, perhaps you can be of some help. Many of our children have disappeared mysteriously, and I've no doubt the Ghelsba Orcs are behind it.≺Prompt≻
The Royal Knights should be on the job by now, but the two princes are at each other's throats.≺Prompt≻
Prince Trion, the eldest, says we should launch a full attack, with all haste.≺Prompt≻
While his younger brother, Prince Pieuje says the safety of the children comes first, and he won't authorize an attack.≺Prompt≻
They've been arguing this back and forth for days. The knights' hands are tied, and frankly, nobody knows what to do.≺Prompt≻
If you really want to make a name for yourself, go to Ghelsba, and rescue those kidnapped children!≺Prompt≻
What say you? Will you go?≺Prompt≻
Here's your mission, then. Rescue the two children kidnapped by the Orcs of Ghelsba Outpost.≺Prompt≻
Ghelsba Outpost is northwest of West Ronfaure. Take the path before the Westgate, then turn right when the path splits in the forest. You'll find the entrance up in the hills.≺Prompt≻
If you have trouble finding the way, just follow one of the soldiers on patrol.≺Prompt≻
Orcs tend to keep their hostages in tents or small huts. Once you're inside the compound, check them first.≺Prompt≻
Ah, you've returned! You were gone so long, I feared a warmachine had got you!≺Prompt≻
At any rate, mission complete! And to reward your accomplishment...≺Prompt≻
I hereby recognize you, ≺Player Name≻, as a certified adventurer of San d'Oria! You're now mission rank two, as well.≺Prompt≻
But don't get too excited. Your title is valid only here in San d'Oria, understand?≺Prompt≻

In order to become a true adventurer, and bear ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, you must be recognized by Bastok and Windurst as well.≺Prompt≻
'Tis a treaty between the three lands, and its word is law. I know it's hard, but those are the rules.≺Prompt≻
For now, cut your adventuring teeth in the areas near here. Sooner or later you'll find your way into other lands.≺Prompt≻
You achieve rank 2!≺Prompt≻
There's not much work in right now. I suppose you could go participate in the Temple Knights' rescue drills out on the La Theine Plateau.≺Prompt≻
Enter the forest beyond the Westgate and head southwest. You'll come out onto the La Theine Plateau before long.≺Prompt≻
Once you're out on the plateau, keep going until you see the knights. The training grounds aren't far from there.≺Prompt≻
It's all just a drill, so this should be easy compared to your usual fare. Just follow orders and you'll be fine.≺Prompt≻
You've returned! I hear the drill turned into something far more perilous. But real battle is the best drill for recruits, in my opinion.≺Prompt≻
Regardless, you've done well. I'll turn to you when there's work to be done, now.≺Prompt≻
Here, take this ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Go ahead, you've earned it.≺Prompt≻
This time it's messenger duty. One of our knights is out scouting in a place called Davoi, on the southern edge of Jugner Forest.≺Prompt≻
The Orcs' stronghold is in Davoi, so it's vital that we stop them from massing, or they may launch an assault.≺Prompt≻
Of course, the Orcs are keeping an eye on us, too. Why, just a few days past, a squad of our Royal Knights fell to their axes.≺Prompt≻
We have sent scouts to find a weakness in their defenses. You must find the scout there now, and bring back the latest scouting report.≺Prompt≻
The scout's name is Zantaviat. He's somewhere in Davoi, but where I cannot say.≺Prompt≻
Come back after you've gotten the report. Those lands are no place to wander.≺Prompt≻
You have returned! And you've brought the scouting report. Good work, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
Troubling news, this is. It says that Orcs are gathering deep inside the encampment. The time to act is coming!≺Prompt≻
But that is not your concern. You've done well today. Mission complete!≺Prompt≻
Oh, it's you, ≺Player Name≻. And at just the right time, too. Monarlais Halver is looking for an adventurer such as yourself.≺Prompt≻
Enter Chateau d'Oraguille. Monarlais Halver is there; he'll explain in person.≺Prompt≻
What? You haven't been certified in Bastok and Windurst yet? You may dally, but others are not! Get moving!≺Prompt≻
Ah, welcome back. I see you've been certified in Bastok and Windurst. Good work. You'll make a fine adventurer.≺Prompt≻
What's that, a report for our kingdom? I see. Take that to the monarlais when you go.≺Prompt≻

You should receive ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ from Monarlais Halver. Now, go to Chateau d'Oraguille and let them know you're back!≺Prompt≻
Hurry to Chateau d'Oraguille and give that report to Monarlais Halver!≺Prompt≻
You achieve rank 3!≺Prompt≻
Ah! You've come at just the right time. Zantaviat, one of our scouts in Davoi, needs an adventurer.≺Prompt≻
He wants someone to infiltrate Davoi and scout behind enemy lines. Know anyone fitting that description?≺Prompt≻
Now that you've got your ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, this is an opportunity to prove you're worth it!≺Prompt≻
The situation in Davoi worsens by the day. This won't be easy, but I can't think of a better adventurer for the job!≺Prompt≻
You've returned! Zantaviat told me everything. Congratulations on a job well done!≺Prompt≻
But we can't let down our guard yet. Those Orcs will not just sit there. We must keep constant vigil, and move before they do!≺Prompt≻

Here's your reward: ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. You're becoming quite the adventurer, aren't you?≺Prompt≻
Welcome back! I have an important mission for you this time. Recently, land is eroding due to crystal formation...and it's getting worse.≺Prompt≻
There's a small spring on the eastern edge of Jugner Forest, called Crystwater Spring. We must know what effect crystal formation has on the wildlife there.≺Prompt≻

I want you to get me a fish from the spring. And not just any fish! You need to get ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
Ah, that reminds me--have you any fishing gear? You'll need some for this mission.≺Prompt≻
There are people about that know a thing or two about fishing, should you need help finding and choosing your gear.≺Prompt≻
Ah, the great angler returns! I was worried, to be honest. All you hear these days is the massing of beasts, the erosion of the Crystal Lines, and now...≺Prompt≻
...rumors that the Shadow Lord himself has returned!≺Prompt≻
We will examine the fish you brought. Depending on the results, we may need to act! I'll let you know if we need your help.≺Prompt≻
Ah, it's you, ≺Player Name≻. You've come at a good time. I've news for you.≺Prompt≻
By order of the Kingdom of San d'Oria, you're to head to Jeuno as an ambassadorial attaché.≺Prompt≻
Go to Chateau d'Oraguille. Monarlais Halver will tell you all you need to know.≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
≺Prompt≻
There you are! I've been looking for you. Monarlais Halver requests your presence at the chateau immediately.≺Prompt≻
It sounds as if this is a fairly important mission. I need not remind you that you should take care to properly equip yourself before embarking on this journey.≺Prompt≻
I'm not sure what it's about, but you'd best make haste. The monarlais is not to be kept waiting!≺Prompt≻
Why, if it isn't ≺Player Name≻! This is no time for loafing around, friend! Prince Trion is looking for you.≺Prompt≻
For this next mission, he's requested you personally. You should be honored!≺Prompt≻
As for the details of the mission, I've no idea what he wants, but he was in a hurry. You'd best be off to Chateau d'Oraguille!≺Prompt≻
It is a great thing you've done, ≺Player Name≻! I knew deep in my heart that you were the one for the task.≺Prompt≻
You'd better get to the chateau quick. They're all waiting to welcome you back, I'd wager.≺Prompt≻
You've saved our proud Kingdom of San d'Oria. No, you're the savior of all Vana'diel! There's not a soul that doesn't owe you a great debt, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
Ah, if it isn't ≺Player Name≻! You had best hurry off to Chateau d'Oraguille. It seems as if something terrible is in the works there.≺Prompt≻
Well, if it isn't ≺Player Name≻! Your timing is perfect. The chateau just sent a request for an adventurer.≺Prompt≻
It looks as if this next mission has something to do with the late queen. You should feel honored. It's not every day that an adventurer gets to work directly with the royal family.≺Prompt≻
Spoken like a true San d'Orian! Now hurry off to Chateau d'Oraguille and get the details on the mission from Monarlais Halver.≺Prompt≻
What's wrong? Dealing with royalty is not your cup of tea? Well, think about it and come back when you've come to your senses.≺Prompt≻
Prince Trion is requesting the aid of an adventurer. How about it?≺Prompt≻
It looks fairly urgent, so you should hurry to the chateau. The prince is waiting in his chambers.≺Prompt≻
I expected more from you, ≺Player Name≻. If you change your mind, return here. I'll be waiting.≺Prompt≻
I have received the details of your mission from Prince Trion. I will deliver this book to the scholars for deciphering.≺Prompt≻
The deciphering of the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will take a considerable amount of time. Return later for a report.≺Prompt≻
You handed the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ over to the guard.≺Prompt≻

Ah, ≺Player Name≻. We've been waiting. Prince Trion is calling for you. I wonder if this means the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ has been completely deciphered.≺Prompt≻
Well done, ≺Player Name≻! I knew you would not let the Kingdom down.≺Prompt≻
I'm proud to increase your rank to 7!≺Prompt≻
The papsque has work for you, ≺Player Name≻. Are you willing to take on the task?≺Prompt≻
Excellent. Proceed to the papsque's chambers on the third floor of the cathedral.≺Prompt≻
The papsque often comes across as a difficult man, but he is actually very kindhearted and compassionate. If you change your mind, I'll be waiting here.≺Prompt≻
The fair Claidie I d'Oraguille has invited you to the chateau. She wishes for you to see the flowers that have bloomed from the seeds you brought back from Altepa.≺Prompt≻
It is an honor to be invited to the chateau garden. One day you may even have the opportunity to attend one of their royal garden parties.≺Prompt≻
We cannot keep the princess waiting. Now, off to the chateau!≺Prompt≻
A party of Royal Knights stationed in Ghelsba Outpost have reported strange activity by Orcs deep within Yughott Grotto.≺Prompt≻
From your reports, we already know that the beastmen have built a giant portal, but their motives remain unclear.≺Prompt≻
It makes me shudder to think of what those Orcs are planning with that portal...≺Prompt≻
≺Player Name≻, your next mission is to travel to Ghelsba and continue your investigation into the Orcs' activities.≺Prompt≻
Be on your guard when traveling deep into Yughott Grotto. Losing an adventurer such as yourself would deal a great blow to all of San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
I see you need more time for preparations. When you are ready, I'll be waiting.≺Prompt≻
It's hard to believe Orcs have their hands on such dangerous equipment. More patrols will have to be sent out to prevent any new developments in their evil plans.≺Prompt≻

And this ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻... We will have to analyze it and begin reproduction for our forces. We cannot let Orcs get the Treasure of the Dragon King before San d'Oria does.≺Prompt≻
Well, congratulations on the completion of your mission. Hmmm? Do I know of an adventurer named Eideialc? Never heard of him.≺Prompt≻
But you need not worry about some petty traveler. You are in a different league. You are now rank 8!≺Prompt≻
Princess Claidie's coming-of-age ceremony is drawing near. This ceremony is an important facet of d'Oraguille tradition.≺Prompt≻
Monarlais Halver has put out a call to high-ranking adventurers for their assistance in Chateau d'Oraguille.≺Prompt≻
Ah, the young princess has finally become a lady... Oh, I'm sorry. You can get the details of your next mission from Sir Halver.≺Prompt≻
What? You do not wish to repay the kindness the princess has shown to you in the past months? As you wish...but if you change your mind, you know where to find me.≺Prompt≻
I am busy with preparations for Princess Claidie's coming-of-age ceremony. You don't know what kind of vermin could be roaming the streets and looking for trouble.≺Prompt≻
Princess Claidie's coming-of-age ceremony is about to begin at the cathedral. I must remain at my post, but why don't you attend?≺Prompt≻
The king has requested your audience. He has selected you from the mountain of adventurers in San d'Oria. You should feel honored!≺Prompt≻
You have matured from a fledgling adventurer into a great asset to our kingdom. Do not let us down.≺Prompt≻
There is no need for modesty at a time like this. The fate of San d'Oria is at stake!≺Prompt≻
The authorities are saying that a dark cloud of despair is looming over the Kingdom. They are asking for the assistance of only the best adventurers.≺Prompt≻
I can think of none more qualified than you. Will you accept this mission?≺Prompt≻
Then proceed to the Audience Chamber in the Chateau d'Oraguille. Word has it that His Highness is not feeling that well. He may not be present for your briefing.≺Prompt≻
≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[Sir/Lady] ≺Player Name≻! The Kingdom is counting on you. Who else, I ask you, is worthy for this task?≺Prompt≻

Ah, a time of great change is upon us. In a matter of days, the Rites of Succession will be held at the cathedral in Northern San d'Oria. It is then that the new heir to the throne will be decided.≺Prompt≻

Due to the unpredictable circumstances that took place at the princess's coming-of-age ceremony, this time, only authorized personnel will be allowed near the proceedings. However, the royal family has requested your services as a guard.≺Prompt≻
Even we Royal Knights have not been granted permission to attend... You must be held in high regard by His Highness. I envy you, ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[Sir/Ma'am].≺Prompt≻
When you have finished your preparations, proceed directly to the cathedral to report.≺Prompt≻
Off the record, which of the two princes do you think should be the next heir to the throne?≺Prompt≻
It is a difficult decision, but... ≺Selection Dialog≻Trion is better suited. Pieuje is better suited.≺Prompt≻
Hm... Being the oldest, he is the true heir, and many people believe he is the most suited to rule the Kingdom. However, Prince Pieuje's prudent ways may be what this country is lacking.≺Prompt≻

Many think as you do, ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[Sir/Lady] ≺Player Name≻. However, what this country may need is someone who will not back down in the face of a threat--someone who will stand up for the pride of the Kingdom.≺Prompt≻

But our opinion is of no matter. Lightbringer will decide who is the most suited to stand over our fine nation. And do not speak a word of today's exchange, for the monarlais will have our heads if he finds out.≺Prompt≻
I realize that you must have many preparations before taking on such an important mission. Take your time and return here when you are ready.≺Prompt≻
DEBUG: U_MS_START= "≺Numeric Parameter 0≻"≺Prompt≻
DEBUG: Went to Davoi, got the report.≺Prompt≻

Clear Conditions Fulfilled: ≺Selection Dialog≻1-1 Brought back Orcish Axe. 1-2 Brought back Bat Fang. 1-3 Rescued the children. 2-1 Training complete. 2-2 Finished Davoi village. 2-3 Visited other countries. 3-1 Davoi Killing Grounds. 3-2. 3-3. 4-1. 4-2. 4-3. 5-1. 5-2. 5-3. 6-1. 6-2. 7-1. 7-2. 8-1. 8-2. 9-1. 9-2. 10-1. 10-2.≺Prompt≻
The San d'Oria residential area is ahead. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
I've not told you about Mog Houses yet, have I? Would you care to learn about them now?≺Prompt≻
Care to learn about Mog Houses? ≺Selection Dialog≻Sure! No, thanks.≺Prompt≻
Mog Houses are useful places. You can recover your HP and MP, and store items there.≺Prompt≻
You can also change jobs there. All adventurers of San d'Orian citizenship are assigned a Mog House.≺Prompt≻
Make yourself at home!≺Prompt≻
The San d'Oria residential area is ahead. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
Would you like to hear about Mog Houses again?≺Prompt≻
Hmm... So be it.≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
By the way, my records indicate that you're renting a room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi].≺Prompt≻
Would you like to check out of the room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi] and move your things back here?≺Prompt≻
Move back to San d'Oria? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes, please. No, not yet.≺Prompt≻
It is done. We've checked you out of your Rent-a-Room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi].≺Prompt≻
All your belongings should be waiting for you inside. Those moogles are amazing creatures, are they not?≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area. Proceed to your Rent-a-Room, foreigner!≺Prompt≻
If you're already renting here, you may come and go as you please, like the Mog House in your homeland.≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area.≺Prompt≻
Wait! By law, all foreigners must lease a Rent-a-Room before entering the residential area!≺Prompt≻
Once you've registered with us, you can use it as you would a Mog House back home, wherever that may be.≺Prompt≻
Will you stay in San d'Oria? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. No, I'd rather not.≺Prompt≻
All right, then. A San d'Orian Rent-a-Room has been leased to your name. Now move along, foreigner!≺Prompt≻
You can set this as your current home point. Once you set a home point, you will return there whenever you are incapacitated.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻
Set this as current home point? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. No.≺Prompt≻
Home point set!≺Prompt≻
A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home points.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻
What will you do? ≺Selection Dialog≻Travel to another home point. Set this as your home point. Other settings. On second thought, never mind.≺Prompt≻
You have registered a new home point! You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.≺Prompt≻
You may teleport from here to any other home point you have registered.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻

Teleport where? ≺Selection Dialog≻Never mind. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｂ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｃ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｄ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｅ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｆ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｇ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｈ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｉ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｊ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｋ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｌ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｍ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｎ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｏ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻8ｐ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. What's this, then? Someone gave you this envelope, did they?≺Prompt≻
Wh-what is this!?≺Prompt≻

Most unpleasant. Do not speak to me of this matter again!≺Prompt≻
You called for me, Your Majesty?≺Prompt≻
Francmage? I was not expecting you so soon. Monarlais...tell him.≺Prompt≻
Yes, sire.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻
Francmage, I've summoned you here today to talk about one thing--the Northlands investigation.≺Prompt≻
Oh, yes, that. Those Bastoker Humes are causing no end of trouble--saying they want to investigate here, there, and the other place...≺Prompt≻
It is true! The Humes are fools, and no better. Can they truly believe that some ancient power lies hidden in that forsaken wasteland?≺Prompt≻
Hah! Do they hope to find the gates to eternal Paradise there, in that lair of fiends most uncouth? Preposterous!≺Prompt≻
We must take control of this situation immediately. Still, we cannot let them walk about the Northlands freely. Who knows what they're plotting under the guise of this “investigation.”≺Prompt≻
Francmage, listen. Go with the investigation party, and keep a close eye on what our foreign “friends” do. They are up to something, it is certain.≺Prompt≻
I am sure nothing will come of this, but in case they do find something in that wasteland, do not let them take it. Understood?≺Prompt≻
As you command, my lord. I would give the very blood that runs in my veins if it were to further the cause of our kingdom. You can rely on me.≺Prompt≻
These foreigners are wily and faithless. Never let down your guard, and may the Goddess of the Dawn protect you in Her mercy.≺Prompt≻
The king has taken a beautiful queen, and I think a splendid addition to the royal family is not far off. An heir, perhaps...≺Prompt≻
We people of San d'Oria, too, must ever look to the future. The Elvaan must never fall behind foreigners, in power or faith.≺Prompt≻
I understand, Your Grace.≺Prompt≻
Very good. Do well, Francmage.≺Prompt≻
Yes, sire! My life for the Kingdom!≺Prompt≻

Why, if it isn't ≺Player Name≻. This time, your mission has been issued by the late Queen Leaute herself. What? It sounds strange? The king will inform you of the details.≺Prompt≻
What do I know about the late queen? I see. You'd like to do your homework before diving into this mission.≺Prompt≻
Well, Queen Leaute I d'Oraguille was originally the Princess of Tavnazia. She married into the d'Oraguille family before the Great War.≺Prompt≻
Known for her exquisite beauty, there wasn't a man in San d'Oria who wouldn't have given his right arm to spend a moment alone with her...including myself!≺Prompt≻
But, as you know, Tavnazia was left obliterated after the Great War. One could tell that this troubled the queen, but she would never show her pain in public.≺Prompt≻
If Tavnazia had survived ruin, Marquis Altedour's son--namely, Queen Leaute's younger brother--would have succeeded to the throne. However, after the war, her brother disappeared.≺Prompt≻
The flames of war have the power to change destinies. I can only pray that our lives will be free of such tragedy. I apologize. I went on too long. The king is ready for your audience now.≺Prompt≻

Bye-bye!≺Prompt≻
That girl used to never come out of her room, but she's brightened up a bit since I started lettin' her help out in the garden.≺Prompt≻
Yes, but nothing we can do will bring back her parents...≺Prompt≻
As long as there is war and strife in Vana'diel, there will always be little girls like Lourima.≺Prompt≻
Your Highness...≺Prompt≻
Ah, ≺Player Name≻. I called you here to thank you in person for bringing the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
You are continuously putting forth your all for the good of the d'Oraguille family. As for me, I have not the power to retrieve a single seed.≺Prompt≻
The princess traveling to other lands? Think of your safety, Your Highness!≺Prompt≻
What if San d'Oria found herself in the same situation that Tavnazia did? What would become of me then? Would I just sit here and wait for the destruction of the Kingdom?≺Prompt≻
Your Highness...≺Prompt≻
Twenty years ago, the beastmen concentrated their forces in Tavnazia...and then the explosion. Nothing was left...≺Prompt≻
The Tavnazian peninsula was ripped from the mainland and became an island.≺Prompt≻
What was the purpose behind the beastmen's actions? Can we truly let something so terrible happen again?≺Prompt≻
But what can I do, a princess locked up in a castle? I envy you, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
Your Highness, speak no more of such things. Here, take a look at the blooming flowers. ≺Prompt≻
You are right, Chalvatot. ≺Player Name≻, I apologize for my words. Please, stay and enjoy the beauty of the dreamroses.≺Prompt≻
Dear Mother... My coming-of-age ceremony is drawing near. My brothers tell me that during the ceremony I will be informed of all the secrets of the d'Oraguille family.≺Prompt≻
I have heard that the same tradition was carried out in Tavnazia. Mother, what secrets were revealed to you? Will I be able to handle the burden as you did?≺Prompt≻
I beg of you, Mother. Watch over me in these trying times.≺Prompt≻
≺Player Name≻, I assume an adventurer of your stature has heard the rumors of Princess Claidie's coming-of-age ceremony.≺Prompt≻
This ceremony is a piece of d'Oraguille tradition and requires much preparation. This is where your assistance is necessary.≺Prompt≻
Travel to the Fountain of Kings located within the Quicksand Caves, and bring back ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
The princess is always speaking of your deeds for the Kingdom. Everyone here is counting on you, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻

Travel to the Fountain of Kings located within the Quicksand Caves, and bring back ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. The princess is counting on you, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
So, my younger sister has finally come of age... I remember when my brother and I would sneak out of the chateau and search the city for presents to buy her.≺Prompt≻
We would always be awed by the wonders of the city.≺Prompt≻
One year, the king caught us sneaking out. Our mother tried talking to our father, but there was no easing his anger. It was then that I first feared my father.≺Prompt≻
Our mother fell ill shortly after, and there was nothing my brother or I could do to save her. Maybe it was our lack of power to save our mother that made us enemies...≺Prompt≻
I apologize for my rambling. Perhaps I should journey out into the city and select my sister's gift...≺Prompt≻
Claidie has finally come of age... My sister and I don't have many memories of the queen, but every time I see Claidie, I can sense a part of my mother in her.≺Prompt≻
I don't know... It's probably because they look and act so alike.≺Prompt≻
Despite being raised without a mother alongside two older brothers, she has matured into a fine, beautiful woman. Now is her time to shine.≺Prompt≻
Ah, ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. These were used during the princes' ceremonies as well.≺Prompt≻
Tradition prohibits us from allowing you to attend the ceremony, but feel free to view it. The princess would be delighted at your presence.≺Prompt≻
Call forth all members of the court. Has the adventurer ≺Player Name≻ arrived?≺Prompt≻
Ah, ≺Player Name≻. The deciphering of the stone tablet you found has been completed.≺Prompt≻
There is one line that has us especially intrigued...≺Prompt≻
“Light will befall the great Vana'diel only when the true heir of d'Oraguille raises Lightbringer to the heavens.”≺Prompt≻
And this means...≺Prompt≻
It means that only the true heir to the d'Oraguille throne will be able to unsheathe Lightbringer, and that only when he does will the true power of the sword be unleashed.≺Prompt≻
Then it is decided. When we have possession of the legendary sword, Trion and Pieuje will both attempt to unsheathe it.≺Prompt≻
Whoever succeeds will take my place on the throne as the true heir to the House of d'Oraguille.≺Prompt≻
!!!≺Prompt≻
The true...heir?≺Prompt≻
Trion or Pieuje--the sword will decide the future of San d'Oria and lead us from the darkness. Of course, we must first locate the Treasure of the Dragon King.≺Prompt≻
Rahal. Curilla. I want your knights to concentrate their efforts on locating Lightbringer.≺Prompt≻
Yes, Your Highness.≺Prompt≻
Understood, Your Highness.≺Prompt≻
And ≺Player Name≻. Report to Rahal for your orders. I trust that your involvement in this investigation can only benefit San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
Set forth and search the darkness for the light that will guide us to a brighter future. The dawn of a new era in San d'Oria is upon us!≺Prompt≻
≺Player Name≻, I want you to investigate the Temple of Uggalepih.≺Prompt≻
Take this ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ with you on your journey.≺Prompt≻

Use it when searching the area. Any response from the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ may be a clue to the location of Lightbringer. The fate of the Kingdom is riding on your shoulders. Don't let us down!≺Prompt≻
Remember, this mission is a matter of national security. When you have finished your investigation, make your report directly to the king.≺Prompt≻
I have been assigned to the investigation of a remote island off the west of the Vollbow coast. This will be the first time I have left San d'Oria since I was a knight in training.≺Prompt≻
So you were unable to locate Lightbringer... Well, to our surprise, Curilla's expeditionary forces returned yesterday with the sword.≺Prompt≻
Welcome back from your long journey, ≺Player Name≻. I am pleased to report that Curilla's forces located the holy sword, Lightbringer.≺Prompt≻
According to the writings in our ancient tomes, the scholars feel that the retrieved sword is truly the lost Treasure of the Dragon King.≺Prompt≻
The path leading to this day has been long and treacherous. However, our journey is nearly complete. I do not have the words to express my gratitude for your services.≺Prompt≻
I thank you, and wish that you might continue your work for the good of San d'Oria long after I have stepped down from the throne.≺Prompt≻
However, one final ceremony must be held--the true heir to the House of d'Oraguille must be decided. At that time, your service will again be called upon.≺Prompt≻
We located Lightbringer on a small, remote island off the coast of Vollbow.≺Prompt≻
Once a part of Vollbow, the island was ripped away from the mainland by the force of the beastmen's terrible weapons. Now the area is nothing but a wasteland.≺Prompt≻
When I took the sword up in my hands, I could feel something running through it. At that moment, I knew I was holding the true sword of King Ranperre.≺Prompt≻
To tell you the truth, I had my doubts about the Treasure of the Dragon King, but Curilla managed to find it. Still, I am vexed by this--why was the sword on that island?≺Prompt≻
Lightbringer has been found! This is the happiest day in my tenure as monarlais!≺Prompt≻
Thanks to your perseverance and commitment to the Kingdom, Lightbringer has been found, and now the Rites of Succession can be carried out.≺Prompt≻
As long as the Treasure is in San d'Oria, the Kingdom will be safe--regardless of whether myself or my brother is the true heir to the throne.≺Prompt≻
The Rites of Succession will be carried out soon. At that time, your services will once again be called upon.≺Prompt≻
I never imagined myself becoming king. This kingdom needs the leadership of my brother to bring her together.≺Prompt≻
But she also needs someone to step in and take control when my brother has gone too far.≺Prompt≻
If by chance Lightbringer selects me, I do not know if I can prevent San d'Oria's bloody history from repeating itself.≺Prompt≻
Does the Treasure of the Dragon King truly wield the power to rule a kingdom? Are we not reading too much into legend? Only time will bring an answer to my fears.≺Prompt≻
Oh, it's you. How goes it with your wyvern?≺Prompt≻
How goes it? ≺Selection Dialog≻We are steadfast companions. Not as well as I would like.≺Prompt≻
Excellent. I never doubted your success.≺Prompt≻
I see... However, if you continue to shower it with attention, your wyvern will come around eventually. They thrive on affection.≺Prompt≻

On a more serious note, the Royal Knights have recently become the target of a number of attacks by an unknown assailant. It is humiliating for the defenders of the Kingdom to be in this position in the first place, but the situation is more grave than a simple loss of face.≺Prompt≻
There is a rumor circulating among the knights that these attacks are being carried out by Erpalacion, the last dragoon. It has the men unnerved.≺Prompt≻
As I am sure you are aware, Erpalacion was the general of the knights during the rule of King Ranperre, and the only dragoon in existence at the time.≺Prompt≻
Historians all agree on this point: Without the strength of Erpalacion, many great achievements would have been beyond King Ranperre's reach.≺Prompt≻

Erpalacion has joined the ranks of the fallen, so there is no possible way he could be responsible for these attacks. But the fears of the knights have some validity. There is a tale told of Erpalacion...≺Prompt≻
Immediately after King Ranperre had quelled the strife within the Kingdom, Erpalacion was sent by the king's orders on an expedition to the Outlands.≺Prompt≻
It is widely said that this expedition served no strategic significance, and that King Ranperre merely feared the power of Erpalacion.≺Prompt≻
He was never heard from again. King Ranperre apparently nodded in satisfaction when hearing the report from the returning soldiers...≺Prompt≻
I do not believe this story. Even if there is some truth to the tale, there is unlikely to be a reappearance of the last dragoon. ...However, I have no evidence to support my views.≺Prompt≻
I wish to assign you the task of gathering information on the attacks against the Royal Knights. The true culprit must be brought to justice. What say you?≺Prompt≻

I have a task for you. I wish you to gather information on the true culprit behind these attacks. Considering your profession, surely you wish to dispel these rumors that sully the honor of your fellow dragoon.≺Prompt≻
What say you? ≺Selection Dialog≻Leave it to me. Other duties call me.≺Prompt≻
Empty suits of armor...?≺Prompt≻
Sir Rahal!≺Prompt≻
What are you cowering for? These are nothing more than stumbling puppets!≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 34) 1≻≺Prompt≻
Sir Rahal. It must be the ghost of the last dragoon, come to wreak his vengeance...≺Prompt≻
Mind your tongue, Aramaviont. You stand on castle grounds.≺Prompt≻
Yes, sir. My apologies.≺Prompt≻
These empty shells will not rise again. Clear these away, and not a word to anyone of this.≺Prompt≻
Yes, sir!≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 34) 1≻≺Prompt≻
We must get to the bottom of this matter. Have you noticed anything strange these past few days?≺Prompt≻
Someone tried to steal the brais of the last dragoon...? Well, that certainly qualifies. Start your investigation from there.≺Prompt≻
You might try asking for information from the people at the Brugaire Consortium.≺Prompt≻

I concede that this is a problem that only concerns the knights... However, I feel that someone outside our ranks, with some distance from events, has a better chance to grasp the whole picture. Tell me if you have a change of heart.≺Prompt≻
The people at the Brugaire Consortium may have information concerning the brais of the last dragoon. I doubt they would agree with me, but the merchants there owe me a favor.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6ｇ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻! This handwriting... That's what this is all about! ...You must talk with Sir Balasiel on this matter.≺Prompt≻
I cannot speak of it... Or rather, I do not wish to speak of it...≺Prompt≻
You must take this matter to Sir Balasiel. I cannot speak of it... Or rather, I do not wish to speak of it...≺Prompt≻
Ancolain was a powerful warrior, but he lacked self-control. I bode my time until his return to the ranks... But never did I imagine things would come to this.≺Prompt≻

So you learned from Sir Balasiel that your wyvern can sense Ancolain's location...based on the shadow of the thoughts that still cling to the letter. I only hope that he hasn't dabbled in any of the black arts that are practiced by those savages to the south.≺Prompt≻
The misunderstanding that long surrounded King Ranperre and the last dragoon has now been cleared--and with it, the chaos that threatened the stability of the knights. You have my thanks.≺Prompt≻

Ah, you are ≺Player Name≻, are you not? I've heard word of you from the gatehouse. We've got a mission for you--a special mission.≺Prompt≻
Our scouts say the beastmen are rising again... Not just here, but in lands abroad. We want you to go to Bastok and Windurst and see how they fare.≺Prompt≻
While there, you can be recognized by both nations, with ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Not a bad deal, is it?≺Prompt≻
I hereby order you on official business. Visit the two countries of Bastok and Windurst, and receive recognition as an adventurer.≺Prompt≻
Here is a letter of introduction to the consulates of San d'Oria. Just hand it to the consul, and they'll know what to do with you.≺Prompt≻

The consulate will give you further orders. Once both countries have given you official recognition, come back here. I will issue you your ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻3≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
This will be your first journey abroad, ≺Player Name≻, no? None can tell what adventures await. Take care, and come home safe.≺Prompt≻
First you must visit the San d'Orian consulates in Bastok and Windurst. The consuls there will give you further orders.≺Prompt≻
Ah, it's you, ≺Player Name≻. How are things in lands abroad? Come back once you've been officially recognized. I have every confidence in you.≺Prompt≻
You are within the walls of Chateau d'Oraguille, home of royalty. Conduct yourself accordingly.≺Prompt≻
An adventurer from Bastok, are you? Well, you have my respect for coming all the way here.≺Prompt≻
An adventurer from Windurst, are you? Well, you have my respect for coming all the way here.≺Prompt≻
But know you this: our Kingdom of San d'Oria has no intention of showing a friendly facade to either Bastok or Windurst.≺Prompt≻
How you classless mobs could ever think to stand shoulder-to-shoulder with the Elvaan is, frankly, beyond me.≺Prompt≻
Yet on you come--impertinent stuttering shrimps, lumbering ore-heads, purring fur-balls! It's simply unacceptable.≺Prompt≻
But, enough of that...≺Prompt≻
Here is your mission: infiltrate Ghelsba Outpost, northwest of San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
In the middle of the Ghelsba camps is a place called the highland encampment. We want you to defeat the camp head, a “Warchief Vatgit.”≺Prompt≻
You'll find the encampment a little ways into Ghelsba. Go in, cross the river, and you'll see the camps up on a ridge to the east.≺Prompt≻
When you've finished, if you aren't Orc fodder, report back to your own consulate. We don't take kindly to foreigners loitering around the chateau, if you get my meaning.≺Prompt≻
The Orcs aren't so much of a problem that the Kingdom need worry about sending out knights. Let the adventurers clean them up for pocket change--that is our policy.≺Prompt≻
Don't make me repeat myself. Get going.≺Prompt≻
Congratulations, but don't expect anything from us. Our policy towards Windurstians and Bastokers can be summarized as “detached cooperation,” you see.≺Prompt≻
An adventurer from Bastok, are you? Consul Helaku sent word about you. You look able, that's for sure.≺Prompt≻
An adventurer from Windurst, are you? Consul Kasaroro sent word about you. You look able, that's for sure.≺Prompt≻
Well, you may never reach the glory of the Royal Knights, but do good work, and you'll be rewarded accordingly.≺Prompt≻
Here is our dilemma. The Orcs have set up a front-line base of operations in a place called Ghelsba Outpost, northwest of San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
You're familiar with the Quadav, no? Well, Orcs are just like them. A vicious and barbaric race, and quite stupid to boot.≺Prompt≻
You're familiar with the Yagudo, no? Well, Orcs are just like them. A vicious and barbaric race, and quite stupid to boot.≺Prompt≻
The problem is, those Orcs have been showing signs of intelligence lately. They've started using ranged weapons...even machines of war!≺Prompt≻
Our investigations indicate that someone is behind the Orcs, supplying them with weapons.≺Prompt≻
We want you to find a cavern deep in Ghelsba Outpost--a place called Yughott Grotto.≺Prompt≻
We've sent many an adventurer to Yughott Grotto, but few have returned, and we are desperate for knowledge.≺Prompt≻
There may be some...danger involved, but if you provide us with useful information, formal recognition from the Kingdom of San d'Oria will be yours.≺Prompt≻
I'm a little busy here. Report to your country's San d'Orian consulate when you've completed this mission.≺Prompt≻
Well, ≺Player Name≻, it's good to see you again. Let's see the report you've brought back, then!≺Prompt≻
The Shadow Lord...back!? That's impossible! He was slain by our forces in the Great War twenty years ago...≺Prompt≻
What!? The nether beasts have broken out into this land? This is dire news, indeed!≺Prompt≻
If this report is true, we must take action.≺Prompt≻
Hmm...but, to be honest, I find it hard to believe.≺Prompt≻
Very well. I will take this report. You will be issued ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, as promised.≺Prompt≻
Your latest accomplishment raises your mission rank to 3. Congratulations.≺Prompt≻
You must be weary. Be at ease in this chateau. There is much here to soothe the mind and warm the spirit.≺Prompt≻
I've been waiting for you, ≺Player Name≻. As you've probably already heard from the gatehouse, you are to report to the Embassy of San d'Oria at Jeuno.≺Prompt≻
Our relations with Jeuno are vital to maintaining the balance of power between our Kingdom of San d'Oria, Windurst, and Bastok.≺Prompt≻
You will receive your letter of introduction to Jeuno from His Majesty Royaulais Destin himself. Great honor this is!≺Prompt≻
Proceed through the door to the audience chamber. The king is waiting for you. Remember to mind protocol!≺Prompt≻
You have been granted an audience with the king.≺Prompt≻
You audience with the king is finished.≺Prompt≻
What is the matter? Do not keep the king waiting!≺Prompt≻
Welcome, ≺Player Name≻. I am Destin, King of San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
Please, be at ease. I've heard of you from Claidie. Much have you done for the Kingdom, it seems!≺Prompt≻
As I'm sure Lord Halver has told you, we decided to appoint you to serve in the Embassy of San d'Oria at Jeuno.≺Prompt≻
Recently we lost one of our staff there. But do not be alarmed, for you shall serve under my direct appointment.≺Prompt≻
Take that letter of introduction with you and depart for Jeuno.≺Prompt≻
The embassy has been informed, and is expecting you. Show the letter to any of the staff there.≺Prompt≻
Depart as soon as you are able.≺Prompt≻
Safe journeys, ≺Player Name≻.≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 34) 2≻≺Prompt≻
Get to Jeuno, and take that letter of introduction with you. Ambassador Jima is anxious to see you!≺Prompt≻
Hello, ≺Player Name≻. You've rushed back from Jeuno upon hearing the news, right? Well, we've taken care of those bandits already.≺Prompt≻

Well, Halver is exaggerating again, with talk of a botched assassination. What could he mean by the king falling unconscious? Surely he is not calling adventurers to the chateau over such nonsense!≺Prompt≻
Such brigands cannot stand before the might of the Temple Knights! His whisperings dishonor our nation. Do you not agree?≺Prompt≻
Curilla? Are you there?≺Prompt≻
Yes, Your Majesty!≺Prompt≻
Ah, very good. Your leadership was exemplary, as always. Thanks to you, I may focus on my duties.≺Prompt≻
You are too kind, Your Majesty.≺Prompt≻
However, Curilla, there seems to be something you overlooked.≺Prompt≻
Your Majesty?≺Prompt≻
During the uproar, somebody made off with the talisman!≺Prompt≻
The talisman, Your Majesty? Not the one that keeps the Shadow Lord imprisoned!≺Prompt≻
The very one. We were visited by an infiltrator while our eyes were on the brigands.≺Prompt≻
So, the intruders were but a decoy...≺Prompt≻
I suspected them so.≺Prompt≻
And who might know of the talisman's existence, even among San d'Orians? Your Majesty, I fear someone bent on bringing the Shadow Lord back from his exile did this!≺Prompt≻
But before we track down this infiltrator, first must we thwart their sinister plot. Halver, let us decide on a plan of action.≺Prompt≻
Curilla, be not disheartened; by no means was this your fault. Call off the alert, and return to your regular duties.≺Prompt≻
Well, ≺Player Name≻, your help is needed yet again. Halver will convey my orders soon enough... Remember, you have our thanks!≺Prompt≻
We shall begin immediate discussion on a policy for action. ≺Player Name≻, you must work on improving your skills and equipment.≺Prompt≻
Speak naught of the attempt on the king's life, nor of this business with the Shadow Lord, lest panic grip the Kingdom!≺Prompt≻
We've come to a decision at last, ≺Player Name≻. We will send an expedition to the accursed Northlands.≺Prompt≻
It will go to the ancient ruins of Fei'Yin, northeast of the Beaucedine Glacier. Of course, you'll be going, too.≺Prompt≻
The ruins are those of a city built by an ancient civilization that we believe was more advanced than our own.≺Prompt≻
The race that lived there called themselves the Zilart. We have found similar ruins on Cape Teriggan to the south.≺Prompt≻
Amazingly they both remain, though they were built long ago. It is as if some unseen force defies time to protect them.≺Prompt≻
Once, thirty years ago, an international expedition was sent to the Northlands. They were to uncover the secret of the Zilart's power.≺Prompt≻
They returned empty-handed. We need you to head to the Beaucedine Glacier and scour the ruins of Fei'Yin yourself.≺Prompt≻
The ruins are overrun with fiends, you know. We captured it from the Shadow Lord twenty years ago at the cost of many lives.≺Prompt≻
We set a seal on the ruined coliseum to strengthen the barrier of the Northlands from the inside.≺Prompt≻
You must find it, and use this new seal to strengthen its magic if necessary.≺Prompt≻
Yes, I'm concerned about the Shadow Lord's return. But if the border falls and the nether beasts pass into our realm, all in this world will fall to ruin.≺Prompt≻
Of course, you'll be going, too.≺Prompt≻
Welcome back, ≺Player Name≻. Time is of the essence, as you know, so I'll dispense with formalities. What did you find in Fei'Yin?≺Prompt≻
So the seal in Fei'Yin was already broken... What will we do, should the nether beasts be brought to battle as they were twenty years ago?≺Prompt≻
The answer is simple, Halver. We must bring the battle to them!≺Prompt≻
But, Your Highness, we lack knowledge of our enemy. Though tempting, an attack would be far too dangerous.≺Prompt≻
An attack would be most effective at this early stage! We need not worry about our forces, either. Plenty of reckless adventurers are willing to fight.≺Prompt≻
Be not so hasty, Prince Trion.≺Prompt≻
Curilla! What a pleasant surprise!≺Prompt≻
Please consider the alliance! We must not move troops beyond our borders without first consulting our allies.≺Prompt≻
The enemy is upon us! We've no time to chat with foreigners. We must act now!≺Prompt≻
Forgive me, but how will we explain this, when it was our responsibility, as watchers of the Northlands, to stop our foes before they struck?≺Prompt≻
It is not our duty to explain to foreigners our kingdom's policies. We should move our forces now, so that no explanation will be needed!≺Prompt≻
Please, I beg you! Ask Jeuno to gather the three great nations, and establish a unified front!≺Prompt≻
Silence, Curilla, silence! Since when have you become the weeping dove?≺Prompt≻
Please, listen to reason, Prince Trion! We have but scarce information on the Shadow Lord's return, and what we do have has been collected by adventurers--it's unreliable at best!≺Prompt≻
But if the Shadow Lord has come again, then we need the help of the other countries even more!≺Prompt≻
I have heard enough of your cooing prattle, Curilla! It is clear I can look to no one but myself for decisive leadership!≺Prompt≻
Where has my dear brother Pieuje has gone off to, and at such a critical time as this?≺Prompt≻
Cooing...prattle?≺Prompt≻
With the reconnaissance of Fei'Yin complete, our kingdom must take action quickly. Unfortunately, with circumstances being what they are, I cannot issue orders for your next mission.≺Prompt≻
I believe it will take some time for us to reach a decision. Your time will come in due course, my friend. Until then, be well.≺Prompt≻
Political maneuvering, you call it? To think our nation could become this cesspool of manipulation and intrigue...≺Prompt≻
We have no time for these antics! If they truly are plotting to raise the Shadow Lord, we have not a moment to lose!≺Prompt≻
Things cannot be allowed to proceed as they are. There must be a way to convince him...≺Prompt≻
I understand his lordship's fervor, but the risk is too great for us. I believe this requires utmost caution.≺Prompt≻
Ah, ≺Player Name≻, is it not? Prince Trion was looking for you.≺Prompt≻
How long do these fools wish to sit here discussing our deaths? We've no time for talk, not anymore.≺Prompt≻
We must move to stop the return of the Shadow Lord, or war will come upon Vana'diel once again.≺Prompt≻
≺Player Name≻, this is an order! Hurry as quickly as you can to Castle Zvahl in the far north, and put an end to this evil scheme of the beastmen!≺Prompt≻
I will accept all responsibility for this mission. Now, go, brave warrior! For the future of Vana'diel!≺Prompt≻
Foolishness! He was destroyed in the Great War, twenty years ago! They must have mistaken another fiend for him--that's what has happened, I'm sure of it!≺Prompt≻
Who is the fool here? If it truly is him, then what? We would be facing far worse than the beastmen rabble then!≺Prompt≻
Think before you speak, brother! If it is him, then why has he not shown himself these last twenty years?≺Prompt≻
I'm saying we cannot afford to take that chance! This is more than an internal affair--we need to send an investigation party, immediately!≺Prompt≻
Welcome, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
I am Mistaravant. I have served as head steward of this chateau for many a year.≺Prompt≻
This is the room of King Destin. No place for the likes of you.≺Prompt≻
Do not loiter inside the chateau.≺Prompt≻
What's this? I'll not have miscreants loitering in the chateau or its grounds! Go about your business, or be thrown out, the choice is yours.≺Prompt≻
What's this? What has happened, here?≺Prompt≻
はっ。この者が部屋のドアを開け、 中へ忍び込もうとしていたので、注意をしていた ところであります。≺Prompt≻
ん？ またおまえか。さっきから 城内をウロチョロするな、と言っておるだろう。 もう一回やったら、本当につまみ出すからな！≺Prompt≻
おい、何度言ったら判るんだ！？ あれほど、ウロチョロするな、と言っただろう。≺Prompt≻
おい、この者を城外へつまみ出せ！！≺Prompt≻
Here lies the beloved Queen Leaute. May Her Majesty's soul find Paradise.≺Prompt≻
Me name's Chalvatot. I be the gardener here, you see.≺Prompt≻
Don't reckon I've seen you before. A new recruit, are you?≺Prompt≻
Eh? I'm busy, can't you see?≺Prompt≻
What is the matter, Chalvatot?≺Prompt≻
Ah, Your Highness! This stranger just came bargin' in here, so I was about to tell--≺Prompt≻
Wait... I've heard of someone like you.≺Prompt≻
Why, you're a new adventurer, are you not?≺Prompt≻
My name is Claidie I d'Oraguille.≺Prompt≻
Why, ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[he/she]'s but a vagrant! There's no need for Your Highness to address ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[him/her] so!≺Prompt≻
Now, now, Chalvatot. ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[He/She] has come to bolster the strength of our kingdom. Adventurers deserve our gratitude!≺Prompt≻
You are ≺Player Name≻, are you not? Forgive this rude reception.≺Prompt≻
Strive always for the glory of our kingdom! May we meet again, ≺Player Name≻.≺Prompt≻
Hmph. Don't you get uppity, just because the princess saw fit to favor you with a few words. It don't mean a thing!≺Prompt≻
I'm busy. If you don't mind, I'd appreciate a little peace and quiet!≺Prompt≻
This garden be the memorial garden for our late Queen Leaute. She always loved flowers, and so she wanted to be buried here, you see.≺Prompt≻
You be an adventurer from abroad, no? If you've got a mission from the monarlais, you'd best be on it, quick.≺Prompt≻
That monarlais don't like dealing with you foreigners much. Come to think of it, neither do I!≺Prompt≻
I am Rahal S. Lebrart, general of the Royal Knights of San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
The Royal Knights are the sword of San d'Oria. Swiftly we strike, and wipe nests of fiends off the face of Vana'diel!≺Prompt≻
We are a band of warriors, and some of us have been known to be...overzealous. But there's not a dark heart in the bunch of us. You have my word!≺Prompt≻
I've just returned from Bastok, I have. There be these Quadav living in the mine-holes there!≺Prompt≻
Bastokers delve for stone and let the Quadav be. But I says we should slay every last one of those shell-backed freaks!≺Prompt≻
Royal Knight Aramaviont reporting! I've returned from Windurst. Maybe it's just me, but the wee folk there are hiding something, I know it!≺Prompt≻
Why else would they let Yagudo run wild over the countryside? I'd lock those nasty feathered fowl up in cages if I were them!≺Prompt≻
I am Curilla V Mecru, and these are the Temple Knights' quarters. We are San d'Oria's shield, protecting the walls of the city from fiends.≺Prompt≻
Chateau and city guards also belong to the Temple Knights. Remember, we are here to serve and protect you.≺Prompt≻
Of course, we have little patience with unsavory folk. Take care you're not mistaken for one.≺Prompt≻
Leaving the chateau?≺Prompt≻
